Norberg-Schulz, Christian: vermittelung + mittelbar + object + arbeit + architektur + beschreibung + welt + vereinen + aspekt + teil + ganz + bedeutung + bedeutungsvoll

author: quote
Norberg-Schulz, Christian: As an intermediary object the work of architecture does not describe the world, rather it unifies some of its aspects in a new meaningful whole.
